content.rendered:
IONNIC MINE BAR 1500MM

Ionnic Mine Bar 1500MM available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Features;

  • New streamline mine bar range featuring all premium products including:
    • IONNIC 103 LED beacon.
    • Nordic CANIS GO 410 work lamp
    • Brigade tonal and bbs-tek reverse alarms.
  • Designed and manufactured in Australia from high quality components.
  • Models also available with forward facing turn signal LEDs.
  • All mine bars equipped with ADR approved IONNIC LED combination lamps – stop, tail, indicator & reverse lamps.
  • Extruded aluminium bar providing greater strength and adaptability.
  • Stepped edge allows for the use of Rhino-Rack® mounting kits.
  • Multi-voltage

Specifications;

  • Voltage: 12-24V
  • Length: 1500mm
  • Beacon Type: IONNIC 103 LED
  • Reverse Alarm: Brigade Tonal 97dB(A)
  • Signal Lamp Type: IONNIC Slimline LED
  • Base: Anodised Aluminium
  • Harness: 4m

CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

excerpt.rendered:
IONNIC MINE BAR 1500MM AVAILABLE FOR ORDER THROUGH AUTOMAX 4X4!

Request a quote below & an Automax team member will contact you with pricing!
